SELECT ri.id, ri.user_id AS userId, ri.content, ri.post_id AS postId, ri.reply_user_id replyUserId, ri.send_create AS sendCreate, pi.title, tu.USERNAME AS username, tu.AVATAR AS avatar FROM reply_info ri LEFT JOIN post_info pi ON ( ri.post_id = pi.id ) LEFT JOIN t_user tu ON ( tu.USER_ID = ri.user_id ) WHERE ri.delete_flag = 0
AND pi.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{replyInfo.title},'%')
AND tu.USERNAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{replyInfo.username},'%')
ORDER BY ri.send_create DESC

SELECT ri.id, ri.user_id AS userId, ri.content, ri.post_id AS postId, ri.reply_user_id replyUserId, ri.send_create AS sendCreate, pi.title, tu.USERNAME AS username, tu1.USERNAME AS replyUserName, tu.AVATAR AS avatar FROM reply_info ri LEFT JOIN post_info pi ON ( ri.post_id = pi.id ) LEFT JOIN t_user tu ON ( tu.USER_ID = ri.user_id ) LEFT JOIN t_user tu1 ON ( tu1.USER_ID = ri.reply_user_id ) WHERE ri.delete_flag = 0 AND ri.post_id = #{ postId } ORDER BY ri.send_create ASC
